13 in blo work even single_crochet in each single_crochet across 18 14 in blo *1 single_crochet 1 decrease* across 12 15 in blo *decrease* across 6 finishing working in both loops now crochet around the edges of the shell still using both pieces of yarn leave a really long tail when you bind off so you can sew the shell to the armadillo later on the first time i did this i barely had enough yarn to sew it on so don t be shy with your bind off tails when sewing the shell to the armadillo later on the short rounded side is going to go next to the tail and use pins to hold the shell in place as you sew it on tongue for dead armadillo only row instruction stitches 1 chain 6 leave a long tail in your slip knot slip_stitch into 2nd chain from hook and in next chain single_crochet in next chain and half_double_crochet in last chain bind off leaving a long tail using both tails position the tongue at the side of the armadillo s mouth or where the mouth would be on an armadillo and use your crochet hook to thread the tails on each side of a crochet stitch tie a knot then pull the threads inside the body of the armadillo and cut them off if needed page 5 of 10 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com putting it all together here are all the pieces laid out-- ready to be put together i put the legs on first as you can see this
